scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../smartshop-frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.netlify:build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.netlify:test: npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd ../smartshop-frontend && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules smartshop-frontend/node_modules backend/dist smartshop-frontend/dist
scripts.clean:win:
if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules & if exist backend
ode_modules rmdir /s /q backend
ode_modules & if exist smartshop-frontend
ode_modules rmdir /s /q smartshop-frontend
ode_modules & if exist backend\dist rmdir /s /q backend\dist & if exist smartshop-frontend\dist rmdir /s /q smartshop-frontend\dist
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../smartshop-frontend && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps
